committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia

official_title: To amend titles 5 and 39 of the United States Code to make Postal Inspectors eligible for availability pay for criminal investigators.
short_title: United States Postal Service Postal Inspectors Equity Act
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: United States Postal Service Postal Inspectors Equity Act - Applies provisions regarding availability pay for federal criminal investigators to Postal Inspectors.

titles.title: United States Postal Service Postal Inspectors Equity Act
To amend titles 5 and 39 of the United States Code to make Postal Inspectors eligible for availability pay for criminal investigators.
